dcterms:creator: B. C. Lowekamp
D. T. Chen
L. Ibáñez
D. Blezek
dcterms:description: SimpleITK is an interface to the Insight Segmentation and Registration Toolkit (ITK) designed for biomedical image analysis, although it does not directly support the evaluation of medical image segmentation.
dcterms:title: SimpleITK

dcterms:creator: O. Maier
dcterms:description: Medpy is a medical image processing library written in Python that includes functions to evaluate medical image segmentation, primarily supporting binary segmentation results.
dcterms:title: Medpy

dcterms:creator: L. Maier-Hein
B. Menze
dcterms:description: Metrics reloaded discusses pitfalls and recommendations for image analysis validation, providing insights into the evaluation of medical image segmentation metrics.
dcterms:title: Metrics reloaded
